scripts.build:vendors:dev: browserify                          -r react -r react-dom -r prop-types -r color -r react-jss                                                 -o vendors/js/vendors.js
scripts.build:vendors:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production                        browserify                          -r react -r react-dom -r prop-types -r color -r react-jss                                                 -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o vendors/js/vendors.min.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui-no-deps:dist:dev: browserify -r ./src/lib/:dev-box-ui -x react -x react-dom -x prop-types -x color -x react-jss                                                 --debug -o build/dist/js/dev-box-ui-no-deps.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui-no-deps:dist:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production        browserify -r ./src/lib/:dev-box-ui -x react -x react-dom -x prop-types -x color -x react-jss                                                 -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o build/dist/js/dev-box-ui-no-deps.min.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui-with-deps:dist:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production      browserify -r ./src/lib/:dev-box-ui -x react -x react-dom                                                                                     -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o build/dist/js/dev-box-ui-with-deps.min.js
scripts.build:demo: browserify                          -x react -x react-dom -x prop-types -x color -x react-jss -x dev-box-ui                                   --debug -o demo/js/demo.js demo.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:vendors:dev && npm run build:vendors:prod && npm run build:dev-box-ui-no-deps:dist:dev && npm run build:dev-box-ui-no-deps:dist:prod && npm run build:dev-box-ui-with-deps:dist:dev && npm run build:dev-box-ui-with-deps:dist:prod && npm run build:demo && npm run build:babel:release
scripts.clean: rimraf build/dist/js/* && rimraf build/src/* && rimraf vendors/js/* && rimraf demo/js/*
